tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO TRY THE BALI RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO TRY THE BALI RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND KINTAMANI TOUR IS COMBINATION TOUR PACKAGES TO TRY THE BALI RAFTING ADVENTURE AT AYUNG RIVER AND CONTINUE VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH BREATHTAKING VIEW OF MOUNT BATUR VOLCANO

description.text: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour is a Bali Combination Tour Packages to feel the experience white water rafting tours at Ayung River Bali and continue to enjoy the view of breathtaking of Mount Batur Volcano at Kintamani Village. Ayung river is the best river for rafting experience with rapids challenge and suitable for beginner. Beside feel the rafting adventure you also will get chance to enjoy the beauty of panoramaaround the river and see the animal and beautiful birds. Is great combination and pefect choices for those want to try the advneture and enjoy the beauty of mount batur volcano panorama. After finish ayung rafting you will enjoy the delicious set lunch with indonesian menu. The finish lunch we will visit Kintamani Village, exactly at Penelokan where is the best spot to view the amazing mount batur volcano and lake batur. Then continue visting coffee plantation to see various coffe such as robusta, bali coffee, chocolate and to see how to make animal coffee or known as a Luwak Coffee. Then continue visiting Tegallalang Rice Terrace is beautiful rice terrace in northern of Ubud village with amazing small river valey beside. Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour is enjoyable with our Private Bali Tours Driver which is friendly and always make sure if this trip is memorable one for you and family. Below is short description of tourist destination and activity during Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour.

title.title: Ayung River Rafting Adventure | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour | Bali Ayung River Rafting | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of the best Bali Rafting tour in northern part of Ubud with the beautiful and high riverbank. Ripples irrigate the river rock, tracing Bali nature pass the river which is full of fun and pass the attractive and challenging rapids are the impressive Ayung Rafting experience on your vacation in Bali. Your Bali Rafting Tour adventure in the water will end at the finish point and enjoy the buffet lunch. Taking shower and change clothes will be reserved to refresh your body. The comfortable transportation which have been provided will bring the you return to hotel with fully memory. Enjoy the White Water Rafting Adventure at Ayung River is correct choice for the adventure in river water.

button.title: Ayung River Rafting Adventure | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

title.title: Kintamani Volcano View | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour | Kintamani Village | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of countryside located in the hill and the beautiful panorama surround it. We can see beautiful panorama from Kintamani Village to overview the active volcano of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. It is situated in the plateau area with cool weather surround it. When we stand up at Kintamani, we will be able to see the rural area which is close to the lake. Kintamani is the object of mountain tourism is very unique and stunning, with cool air condition in the daytime and cold at night. We can watch stunning natural scenery of Penelokan, a combination of Mount Batur and the expanse of black rock with Lake Batur and on a blue caldera.

title.title: Bali Coffee Plantation | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour | Coffee Plantations | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Coffee Plantation or Bali Agrotourism is coffee farm where you can see varius of coffe planation and see the making of the famous animal coffee or known as a coffe luwak. in this place you can see various of plantation such as coffee arabica, coffe robusta, pineapple, balinesse snake fruit, and etc. expereince to see how to make Balinesse coffee, try the best of balinesse coffe or ginger tea with green view river valley. They sell variety of theirs original Balinese coffee products, herb oil and etc and see the civet cat the most expensive coffee maker, wellknown as Luwak, its produce "Coffee Luwak" and see the process of making this animal coffee.

button.title: Bali Coffee Plantation | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour

image.title: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour | Tegallalang Rice Terrace | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace located in Tegalalang village in northern Ubud, location right beside the main street to Kintamani village and become the famous place for stop and enjoy the view of rice verdant in small valley. Some time you will see the farmer works in the rice field, is great experience you will have by closed to the main food of Bali which is rice. The verdant looks so beautiful with the green paddy make more amazing, perfect place for taking picture and if you want you can walk in the rice terrace. The rice terrace not so big like the jatiluwih rice terrace but offer same excitement and experience. Is perfect place for last stop during the rafting and kintamani volcano view tour.

price.title: Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 900,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 650,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 525,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 475,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 450,000/person

Note : Get special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Kintamani Tour Price Include :

  • Private A/C Car
  • Professional English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Ayung Rafting Adventure in Ubud
  • Lunch Buffet Indonesian Food
  • Entrance Ticket at Tourism Site
  • Insurance Coverage during Ayung Rafting
  • Using facilities locker, shower and towel
  • Mineral Water

content.event: Start for Ayung Bali Rafting Adventure
Rafting finish and join the lunch
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Visit Kintamani Village to enjoy View of Mount Batur Volcano
Visit Coffee Plantation or Bali Agrotourism
Visit Tegalalang Rice Terrace

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
